title: Admission through kcet
content: What will be the total fees through kcet per year and will it differ according to rank and allotment round

comments.body: No it will be same but may differ through caste(Sc/St)
There is no snq quota in pes....
All rounds ppl who came via kcet will have same fees.....irrespective of their caste and gender....even sc st ppl will have to pay the same fees like the other ppl...
Ohk
What is the total fees btw
130k for everyone....
Oh thank you

Nigga, Don't spread fake news....confirm 2x before blurting out smthg...get a life man...

https://preview.redd.it/xlha84tl3a1f1.jpeg?width=1440&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=9bdd1cabd49fd2bf2b56f31a4d3d0b67b0ec01d4
Op refer this....
You can get some % of the fee refunded if you belong to sc/st and have an income certificate as a scholarship. You still have to pay fee and only your tuition fee can be refunded.
Oh thank you, and just extra question is it okay to join ece in pes or should i consider cse at dsce (no much preference to branch)

Both are good....as you said no preference in branch....would suggest you to join pes and score good cgpa and get yourself transferred to aiml or cse.....but don't keep hopes on these.....and also...you haven't mentioned one important thing....which campus ur referring to RR Campus or EC Campus?? If your getting ece in RR then easily you will get CSE in EC Campus....so it would be worth joining there.....as the placements of both the Campus are almost same only.....
I was speaking about rr campus, i heard ec campus is not that good, if not do u have any placements stats about ec campus
But there are scholarships based on cgpa /sgpa right?

Lmaof....no....lol....I have seniors over there...and also...regarding the placements.....they tend to be equal to RR Campus....as every recruiters in rr visit ec also....so it's worth it....if you get ece in rr and cse in ec....one should definitely go to cse in ec....this is what each and every seniors, mates and me say....
What?? No??
Ohk thanksÂ
Atleast they have tried to maintain equality in term of fees ðŸ˜…
It's not equality lmaooo....it's business.....they don't give a f about equality....
Yes
Wdym ur first year only noÂ
